Features

Cross-cutting capabilities you get with Nexa from day one.

AI throughout

Assistant bar with context suggestions and safe prompt masking.

Governance & RBAC

Roles, Separation of Duties and access guards across modules and APIs.

Security by default

CSP, HSTS, X-Content-Type-Options, rate limiting and secret masking.

Observability & Ops

Health, metrics, masked logs, correlation IDs, job last runs, backups and DR drills.

Performance

Fast pages with pagination, batched fetching and background jobs.

Integrations

Stripe, TrueLayer, HMRC VAT, Twilio, Amazon/eBay/Shopify (mocks/sandbox).
